label: CancellationStatus
comment: Information relevant to a condition of a cancellation.

objectProperties.comment: The code specifying the condition of this cancellation status.
The code specifying the reason for this cancellation status.
A reason, expressed as text, for this cancellation status.
Information, expressed as text, related to the reason for this cancellation status.

referencedBy.comment: A status of a cancellation specified for this financing request document, such as accepted.
